A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've been a huge Star Wars fan since I was a kid and it's nice to see that it can still surprise and excite me after all these years. This is a fresh take on Star Wars that breaths new life into the series. Sure\, there are some world building things that I can nitpick\, but when it comes to characters and storytelling this movie knocks it out of the park.
